questions.question_text: Which of the following is the BEST way to mitigate privacy risk associated with application programming interfaces (APIs)?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
it ensures proactive detection and remediation of security flaws that could lead to privacy breaches

choices.A: Active monitoring of API schema changes
choices.D: Ensure APIs are included in the scope of the vulnerability management program
choices.B: Use only APIs that are developed internally by the organization
choices.C: Document dependency usage of all APIs.

questions.question_text: Which of the following is the GREATEST privacy risk factor for data stored on disk?
A bug has been identified in a third-party video library that could expose sensitive user data. Which of the following is the BEST recommendation to address this issue?

choices.C: Patch the vulnerability before using the library.
choices.A: Perform a full antivirus scan before using the library.
choices.B: Sanitize any sensitive data in the library.
choices.D: Require authentication to access the library.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
Patching the vulnerability is the best recommendation because it directly addresses the root cause of the issue and ensures the library is secure before being used
